name: The Trial (itch) (Liquid Cow Studios, chea10)
description:
The Trial is a First-Person Afro-futuristic parkour game with an emphasis on fluid movement and combat along with PCG levels to create endless replayability. The Trial adheres to culturally sensitive art and design.

Our design pillars are: 

Fluid Movement: A consistent dynamic movement based system that gives players a range of movement mechanics that are usable in quick succession to traverse levels.

Replay-ability: Unique progressive playthroughs for each player by randomly generated tiles.

Afro-futurism: Enticing environment and narrative that portrays a flourishing  Ashanti culture.

Our narrative focuses on an interpretation of futuristic Ashanti culture. Your goal as a player is to prove yourself worthy of joining the Anansi Corps, by demonstrating your speed & agility in a simulated training environment.
